title: Spotifyâ€™s iOS-exclusive Swipe to Queue gesture finally rolls out on Android
content:
The Spotify app on Android is finally getting the highly-requested Swipe to Queue gesture that iOS users have had for years. According to recent reports, the gesture seems to be available for a few users at the moment, but we expect it to roll out to more users over the next few days. For the

The post Spotify’s iOS-exclusive Swipe to Queue gesture finally rolls out on Android appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Spotify for Android is finally getting the highlight requested Swipe to Queue gesture that iOS users have had for years. Read on to learn more.
